forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 2C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy this morning. A few snow showers developing during the afternoon. High 37F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. A few flurries or snow showers possible. Low -8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. A few flurries or snow showers possible. Low near 20F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow showers early and steady snow likely later in the day. High 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers in the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow in the afternoon. High 42F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. Low -1C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. 20-30cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. Low 33F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 100%. 8 to 12 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. High around 5C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning turning to rain in the afternoon. High 43F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low 2C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low 38F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. High 6C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High around 45F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -2C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%. 12-20cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low around 30F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered snow showers during the morning. Then partly to mostly cloudy for the afternoon. High 7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 30%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: A few snow showers scattered about the area in the morning, otherwise a good deal of clouds. High 47F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 30%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Snow likely after midnight. Low -2C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 70%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Snow likely after midnight. Low 31F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 70%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will mix with rain at times during the afternoon. High 6C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning changing to rain late. High 44F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow in the evening will mix with rain at times overnight. Low 3C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 80%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 39F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning turning to rain in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 47F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -2C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low 31F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mixture of rain and snow showers. High 6C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. High around 45F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low -7C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low 21F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 7C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 46F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early, then some snow showers later at night. Low -7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional snow showers later during the night. Low 22F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers early changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 47F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low -2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low near 30F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.
